James Harden

James Edward Harden Jr. Instagram: jharden13

(The Beard, El Chapo, Jimbo Slice, Honey Bun, Uno, The System, Saint James)

Position: Point Guard and Shooting Guard Shoots: Left

6-5,220lb(196cm,99kg)

Team: Los Angeles Clippers

Born: August 26, 1989 inLos Angeles,California us

College: Arizona State

High School: Artesia in Lakewood, California

Recruiting Rank: 2007 (17)

Draft: Oklahoma City Thunder, 1st round (3rd pick, 3rd overall), 2009 NBA Draft

NBA Debut: October 28, 2009

Experience:16 years

Frequently Asked Questions

How old is James Harden?

James Harden is 36 years old.

Where was James Harden born?

James Harden was born in Los Angeles, California.

When was James Harden born?

James Harden was born on August 26, 1989.

How tall is James Harden?

James Harden is 6-5 (196 cm) tall.

How much does James Harden weigh?

James Harden weighs 220 lbs (99 kg).

Is James Harden in the Hall of Fame?

James Harden is not in the Hall of Fame.

When was James Harden drafted?

James Harden was drafted by Oklahoma City Thunder, 1st round (3rd pick, 3rd overall), 2009 NBA Draft.

What position does James Harden play?

Point Guard and Shooting Guard.

What is James Harden's net worth?

James Harden has made at least $374,330,943 playing professional basketball.

How much does James Harden make?

James Harden made $44,310,840 in 2022.

What does James Harden average?

James Harden averages 26.2 points, 6.3 rebounds, and 8.7 assists per game.

How many rings does James Harden have?

James Harden has won 0 championships.

What is James Harden's Instagram account?

James Harden is on Instagram at jharden13.

What schools did James Harden attend?

James Harden attended Artesia in Lakewood, California and Arizona State.

What are James Harden's nicknames?

The Beard, El Chapo, Jimbo Slice, Honey Bun, Uno, The System, Saint James are nicknames for James Harden.
